translation.en: [man] You sure you don't wanna use the variable scope for this?
translation.de: Ganz sicher nicht das variable Zielfernrohr?

translation.en: No. I've got a lock on vector and trajectory.
You ever hear that saying, "Listen to your elders"?
translation.de: Kennst du das Sprichwort "Hör auf Betagte"?

translation.en: Big phrase, especially here in Japan.
"Elder" doesn't necessarily mean old. It just means older. As in smarter, wiser.
translation.de: "Betagt" heißt nicht zwingend alt, nur älter, und damit klüger, schlauer.

translation.en: But hey, I'm serious. We blow this chance, it's seven years--
translation.de: Aber im Ernst. Versauen wir das, sind sieben Jahre…

translation.en: Seven years of hard work down the drain.
Ah, so you do listen to me.
I haven't missed once in 12 years.
See? And you say I only think about the work.
translation.de: Na? Und du sagst, ich denke nur an Arbeit.

translation.en: [in English] Well, never mind, then. -Here, catch! -[all grunting]
[woman over radio] Seasonal, single male mark.
Hold on. There's a kid here.
[woman] The window is closing. I repeat, take the shot, Seasonal.
translation.de: Fenster schließt sich. Wiederhole, schießen, Seasonal.

translation.en: [Kate] I've thought about this a long time.
[Varrick] What happened in Osaka shouldn't have.
translation.de: Das in Osaka war ein Versehen.

translation.en: One simple rule. No kids. I know.
I mean, this ain't your first rodeo.
You know there's collateral damage. You know that.
translation.de: Dass es Kollateralschäden gibt, weißt du.

translation.en: Almost to the head of the snake.
Look, I promised I'd finish the job, and I will.
translation.de: Ich erledige den Job. Wie versprochen.

translation.en: You know, I never had one.
What does that mean? I mean, what… Family? Kids?
translation.de: Was heißt das? Was… Familie? Kinder?

translation.en: Two trips to Walmart, you'll be back.
translation.de: Zweimal Walmart und du bist zurück.

translation.en: You haven't even touched your Merlot.
I'm sorry, that was a total pick-up line.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, echt blöde Anmache.

translation.en: The worst way to start a conversation is a "Hey."
It's boring, it's dull. It's for horses.
[woman over radio] Copy. Stage mark. Northwest corner.
[woman] Main entrance, two black sedans. Single.
[in English] Stop, stop. For fuck's sake.
[Varrick] Now you start the rest of your life
translation.de: Jetzt beginnt der Rest deines Lebens.

translation.en: That makes me your mother, your father, your best friend,
translation.de: Also bin ich deine Mutter, dein Vater, dein bester Freund

translation.en: Left. That all you got? Left.
translation.de: Links. Mehr hast du nicht drauf? Links.

translation.en: You've been out almost a day.
[in English] Have you had any recent exposure to radioactive materials?
translation.de: Waren Sie in letzter Zeit radioaktivem Material ausgesetzt?

translation.en: The reason I ask is you appear to be suffering from accelerated ARS.
translation.de: Ich frage, weil Sie an ASS leiden.

translation.en: Caused by subjection to potent radiation in…
it appears to be more specific.
We'll take the Margaux to go.
How much time do I have?
-But we will make it painless for you. -[scoffs]
Five liters of blood in the body, heart pumps two a minute.
translation.de: Fünf Liter Blut, zwei Verlust pro Minute.

translation.en: Gun's on your femoral. You do the math.
I need something to keep me going.
These. Load them in the shots, go.
I don't have all the time in the world.
What are you trying to do?
-[woman] …take a shower. -[Stephen] We should just have fun!
-[Stephen] It's the last night. Come on! -I know.
But I still have stuff to do.
What are you talking about? Poison?
They told me it was just a roofie, so they could lift the room.
translation.de: Sie sprachen von K. o.-Tropfen, um alles zu durchsuchen.

translation.en: Even if I knew, I'd be dead if I tell you.
translation.de: Wenn ich's sage, bin ich tot.

translation.en: -Aw, she'll be dead if you don't. -Wait.
Kazuo Sato. He manages a Yakuza club.
translation.de: Kazuo Sato. Er leitet einen Yakuza-Club.

translation.en: Sato said that if he did this one last thing, that he would set us free.
translation.de: Sato verlangte diese letzte Sache, dann wären wir frei.

translation.en: We could actually start over now.
And it seems we're the same.
And they're gonna know I was here.
[Kate] That's what I'm trying to figure out.
You won't get any more questions from me after today.
translation.de: Danach stelle ich keine Fragen mehr.

translation.en: Grand honcho of the biggest family in Tokyo.
translation.de: Big Boss der größten Familie in Tokio.

translation.en: Your mark in Osaka was Kijima's younger brother, Kentaro.
translation.de: Dein Ziel in Osaka war Kijimas jüngerer Bruder, Kentaro.

translation.en: [sighs] I won't lie, it's been a shitshow for us as it's been for you, and…
translation.de: Wie bei dir herrscht auch bei uns seitdem nur Chaos.

translation.en: [clears throat] Kijima, apparently, who hasn't been able to let it go.
translation.de: Und Kijima konnte es wohl auch nicht vergessen.

translation.en: Some people have this extraordinary attachment to their siblings,
translation.de: Manche haben diese erstaunliche Bindung zu ihren Geschwistern,

translation.en: as if genetics make a family and…
translation.de: als ob Gene eine Familie ausmachen und…

translation.en: Anyway, all that honor shit, Kijima's been on a tear against the…
translation.de: Diese ganz Ehre-Scheiße ließ Kijima einen Rachefeldzug…

translation.en: How do I get to him?
Last night was a very rare opportunity.
What about Sato? Kazuo Sato. Ring a bell?
translation.de: Und Sato? Kazuo Sato. Sagt dir der was?

translation.en: I know that some of his guys hang out at a place called the Black Lizard.
translation.de: Einige seiner Jungs hängen im Black Lizard ab.

translation.en: You don't tell me, I kill you. I think you're lying, I kill you.
translation.de: Sagst du nichts, bist du tot. Lügst du, bist du tot.

translation.en: How do I get to him?
-All right. Same question, same deal. -[men shouting in distance]
-[in English] You killed him! He is the-- -He is dead. You worry about you.
translation.de: -Du hast ihn getötet! Er ist… -Tot. Denk an dich.

translation.en: [in English] I'm gonna ask one more time.

translation.de: Ani. Ani-chan weiß es. Sie ist Kijimas Nichte.

translation.en: What the fuck are you doing? Let go of me!
translation.de: Was soll das? Lass mich los!

translation.en: You're gonna call Kijima for me.
I can't. I don't have his number.
Oh, you don't have his number? Really?
Kijima, yeah, I don't have his number!
-How do you reach him? -Okay, who are you?
How do you get in touch with him?
I don't know, I just call ano baka Renji.
[in English] The only person that talks to him.

translation.de: Ani? Renji, eine Gaijin-Schlampe hat mich entführt.

translation.en: [in English] I got the kid. If Kijima wants to see her again,
translation.de: Ich habe sie. Will Kijima sie wiedersehen,

translation.en: he can meet me at the center of Murakawa marketplace in one hour.
translation.de: kommt er in einer Stunde zum Murakawa-Markt.

translation.en: -A second more and she dies. -[Renji in English] Who is this?
[in English] You think you can… You can't get to him this way.
translation.de: Du denkst… Du kriegst ihn so nicht.

translation.en: He doesn't give a shit about me.
[in English] And you know, for your information,
I haven't talked or seen my uncle in, like, a year.
translation.de: Ich sprach oder sah meinen Onkel ein Jahr nicht.

translation.en: Ew, what the fuck? Oh, my God, what is wrong with you?
translation.de: Was zum Teufel? Oh Gott, was ist los mit dir?

translation.en: Yeah, no way. You're all gross and sick.
translation.de: Vergiss es. Du bist eklig und krank.

translation.en: [Ani] Hey, I have to go to the bathroom.
You got any Boom Boom Lemon?
Ugh! I can barely breathe in here.
So many scars and blood. It's so…
translation.de: So viele Narben und Blut. Das ist so…

translation.en: What the fuck are you doing, bitch?
This will keep you safe. Trust me.
translation.de: So bist du sicher. Vertrau mir.

translation.en: Let me see the child first.
Either Kijima walks out right now,
or I leave and you never see the kid alive again.
translation.de: oder ich gehe, und ihr seht sie nie wieder.

translation.en: -[Kate] You better get out of here. -Wait!
[Ani] You're just gonna leave me, then?
[Kate] Kijima didn't show. You're useless to me now.
translation.de: Kijima kam nicht. Du bist nutzlos.

translation.en: Did you see what just happened?
translation.de: Hast du das eben nicht gesehen?

translation.en: My own family wants me gone. Where the fuck will I go?
translation.de: Meine Familie will mich loswerden. Wo soll ich hin?

translation.en: I'll be dead before the night's over.
Hey, that makes two of us.
Why did you save me, then, huh? You're making me regret it!
translation.de: -Wieso dann die Rettung? -Ich bedaure es schon!

translation.en: [Ani] You… you're a… No! You can't abandon me.
translation.de: Du… Nein! Du kannst mich nicht im Stich lassen.

translation.en: I know Kijima killed my dad, and he will kill me.
translation.de: Kijima hat meinen Dad getötet, und jetzt bin ich dran.

translation.en: What did I do wrong, huh?
I haven't done anything to anybody, but they still treat me like shit!
translation.de: Ich tat keinem etwas, trotzdem behandeln sie mich wie Scheiße!

translation.en: [Ani crying] Everybody, all the time, just throwing me around, like I'm some piece of garbage.
translation.de: Alle schubsen mich nur herum, als wäre ich Abfall.

translation.en: You don't know what you're talking about.
You just yap, yap, yap. Just "fuck this, fuck that."
translation.de: Immer nur jammern. "Leck mich, fickt euch."

translation.en: You don't know anything! You're a kid!
translation.de: Du weißt absolut nichts! Du bist ein Kind!

translation.en: Are you gonna go kill him?
You'll need me, you know. Like…
You won't make it an hour without my help, okay?
translation.de: Ohne mich überlebst du keine Stunde, ok?

translation.en: And I can do everything, okay?
I know who, where, when, whatever.
-I can help you get him, get my uncle. -Okay.
And I'm really good at shortcuts and maps and…
You can't walk around like this.
You know what? This is stupid. Let's go.
"Everything I should wear should be just covered in blood."
Aw, it's so cute on you.
But you're also a Terminator, bitch. Oh, my God. [imitates gunshot, exclaims] "I die."
translation.de: Du bist auch ein Terminator, Bitch. Oh mein Gott. "Ich sterbe."

translation.en: We're actually pretty much the same.
Who has a line into Kijima?

translation.de: Nur über Renji. Sagte ich doch.

translation.en: It's this fucking cool penthouse, top of the tower.
translation.de: Dieses krass coole Penthouse oben im Turm.

translation.en: I mean, two in the lobby, at least.
We could just shoot our ways in.
No. I have to get to him before he knows what's wrong.
translation.de: Nein. Ich muss an ihn ran, bevor er was kapiert.

translation.en: We'll be fast, okay? Bang, bang! Brrap! [imitates gunshots] "You're dead--"
translation.de: Wir sind schnell, ok? Peng, peng! "Du bist tot…"

translation.en: Stop. Speak less, open your ears.
By being you. Just, you know, louder.
translation.de: Indem du du bist. Halt nur etwas lauter.

translation.en: What do you want from Renji-san?
Of course it is my concern.
translation.de: Klar geht es mich was an.

translation.en: Your concern is to stay whole until I leave here.
translation.de: Sorg du dafür, unversehrt zu bleiben.

translation.en: You may do to me what you must.
translation.de: Stell mit mir an, was du willst.

translation.en: But I will not be disclosing his whereabouts.
translation.de: Aber ich verrate nicht, wo er ist.

translation.en: -Shit, there's one remote for everything. -[loud pop song starts playing]
translation.de: Mist, das Ding ist für alles.

translation.en: There's blood on my face. There's blood.
translation.de: Ich habe Blut im Gesicht. Blut.

translation.en: -No. No, stop it. Stop it! Stop! -Hey. Look at me.
translation.de: -Nein. Lass das. Hör auf! -Hey. Sieh mich an.

translation.en: [Kate] Look only at me, okay? Look only at me and breathe.
translation.de: Sieh mich an, ok? Sieh mich an und atme.

translation.en: Okay? You're gonna live through this.
Hey, maybe we should check this house, huh?
translation.de: Hey, wir sollten uns hier umsehen.

translation.en: -Hey, I think I know where Renji is. -Yeah?
translation.de: Hey, ich weiß, wo Renji ist. Ja?

translation.en: I can see exactly where Renji is and where he will be.
translation.de: Ich sehe genau, wo Renji ist und sein wird.

translation.en: I gotta be honest, I'm having a rough night.
I really need to see your boss Kijima.
translation.de: Ich muss wirklich deinen Boss Kijima sprechen.

translation.en: All of you asshole hyenas getting fat off of my dad's carcass!
translation.de: Ihr ganzen Arschlöcher labt euch am Kadaver meines Dads!

translation.en: Just give him to me, and you'll live. Okay?
translation.de: Liefer ihn mir aus, und du lebst weiter. Ok?

translation.en: When he disappears like this, he says, "To be amongst family."
translation.de: Wenn er abtaucht, sagt er: "Ich gehe zur Familie."

translation.en: I don't know what it means.
[Kate] I found him. I found Kijima.
translation.de: Ich habe ihn. Ich habe Kijima gefunden.

translation.en: Hey, I promised you, didn't I?
Kate, tell me where you are, I'll come to you right now.
translation.de: Kate, sag mir, wo du bist, ich komme umgehend.

translation.en: Don't. I'll already be dead anyway.
translation.de: Bis dahin bin ich längst tot.

translation.en: You can find my body near a house in Hottazaka.
translation.de: Vor einem Haus bei der Hottazaka.

translation.en: I don't know anything about you.
Do you wanna know about me?
But I'm the last person you'll get to know.
translation.de: Aber ich werde die letzte Person sein, die du siehst.
Meine Mom ist auch eine Gaijin.

translation.en: That's why I've never met her.
I don't know what she looks like.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, wie sie aussieht.

translation.en: She was like you, I bet.
No shit from no dudes. Just doing what she wants all the time.
translation.de: Nimmt keinen Scheiß von Typen hin und tut, was sie will.

translation.en: It's the old family house. No one really knows about it.
translation.de: Das ist das alte Familienanwesen. Kaum einer weiß davon.

translation.en: Hey, look at you. You can't stand, and you can't see.
translation.de: Hey, sieh dich doch an. Du kannst kaum stehen.

translation.en: -I'm here now. I'm coming with you. -No, you're not.
translation.de: -Ich bin hier und komme mit. -Tust du nicht.

translation.en: Why not? I go where you go.
Take control of your own life.
translation.de: Nimm dein Leben in die Hand.

translation.en: You know, I thought I had the coolest bracelets. I realize now, you have the coolest bracelet.
translation.de: Ich fand meine Armbänder immer cool. Aber deine sind cooler.

translation.en: I have a gun, you know.
Yeah, you don't know shit about my parents, so just fuck off.
translation.de: Du weißt einen Scheiß über meine Eltern, also verpiss dich.

translation.en: Well, I know it couldn't have been easy to lose 'em.
translation.de: Es war kaum leicht, sie zu verlieren.

translation.en: You know, I lost someone that I love a lot.
translation.de: Ich verlor eine Person, die ich sehr liebe.

translation.en: I didn't know Kate had any stupid friends.
Well, she's got you, doesn't she?
translation.de: Nun, sie hat ja dich, oder?

translation.en: She and I aren't really friends, more family.
translation.de: Sie und ich sind keine Freunde, sondern eher Familie.

translation.en: [in English] No, but Varrick, he's… he's…
[in English] Have you ever wondered about Kate's obsession with your family?
translation.de: Hast du dich nicht gewundert, wieso Kate so besessen ist von deiner Familie?
Ja, klar. Ihn meine ich auch.

translation.en: I know you've been through a lot.
translation.de: Ich weiß, du hast viel durchgemacht.

translation.en: Kate ever share with you what she did in Osaka when she first met you?
translation.de: Erzählte dir Kate nie, was sie in Osaka tat, als sie dich erstmals sah?

translation.en: [in English] I have to finish this.
I'm dying. I have to finish… I have to finish something.
translation.de: Ich sterbe. Ich muss es… Ich muss etwas beenden.

translation.en: [in English] Death is the time for the beginnings.
translation.de: Der Tod ist die Zeit des Neuanfangs.

translation.en: No, please. Shoot me if you want, but don't get in that car, okay?
translation.de: Bitte nicht. Erschieß mich, aber steig nicht ins Auto.

translation.en: Look at me. I'm begging you.
translation.de: Hör doch. Ich flehe dich an.

translation.en: You're stronger than I am. You don't have to end up here--
translation.de: Du bist stärker als ich. Du musst nicht…

translation.en: Shut the fuck up! I have nothing left, okay?
translation.de: Halt die Fresse! Ich habe nichts mehr, ok?

translation.en: It's what they do. You and me, we're collateral--
translation.de: Das wollen sie. Wir beide sind Kollateral…

translation.en: you start the rest of your life.
[Varrick] You start the rest of your life.
I know how much you must be hurting right now, losing your parents.
translation.de: Ich weiß, es tut höllisch weh, die Eltern zu verlieren.

translation.en: [woman over radio] I repeat, take the shot.
-[men laughing] -[young Kate] The gun was empty.
Shoot 'em in the stomach, they die slow, in agony.
translation.de: Ein Bauchschuss ist ein qualvoller, langsamer Tod.
Und sie wissen, es war persönlich.

translation.en: [Varrick] Are you gonna let that pain overwhelm you?
[in English] What is she doing here?
She's the future. Mine at least.
translation.de: Sie ist die Zukunft. Meine zumindest.

translation.en: You went after my girl without my permission.
translation.de: Du hast mein Mädel unerlaubt erledigt.

translation.en: I could fucking kill you right now.
My issue is not with my operation.
translation.de: Meine Operation ist nicht mein Problem.

translation.en: It's with you taking it on yourself.
"If she's leaving, I will terminate her."
I just had to work it.
She would have changed her mind. I would have changed my mind.
translation.de: Sie hätte ihre Meinung geändert. Ich hätte meine geändert.

translation.en: That was always the deal, Varrick-san.
translation.de: Das war immer der Deal, Varrick-san.

translation.en: After Kentaro's death, all eyes were on me.
translation.de: Nach Kentaros Tod stand ich im Fokus.

translation.en: I panicked. I moved too quickly, and I'm sorry.
translation.de: Ich geriet in Panik, agierte zu schnell. Das tut mir leid.

translation.en: You know what? You blundered, I blundered.
translation.de: Weißt du? Wir haben beide gemurkst.

translation.en: Maybe we do our best to put this behind us.
translation.de: Wir sollten das hinter uns lassen.

translation.en: In the name of being human.
I can't say I can trust you going forward.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht, ob ich dir noch vertrauen kann.

translation.en: Trust was not a part of the deal.
[guard over radio] Alpha-six, camera two is down. I repeat, camera two is down.
translation.de: Alpha sechs, Kamera zwei aus. Wiederhole, Kamera zwei aus.

translation.en: Well, we, uh, call up the teams, form a barricade around the crystal box.
translation.de: Wir rufen die Teams und verbarrikadieren uns dann.

translation.en: And, uh, you know, we'll hole up in there. Move!
-[man over radio] Bring up the girl. -Copy that.
Okay, Renji. You ain't coming with.
translation.de: Ok, Renji. Du kommst nicht mit.

translation.en: You guys, stay with him. You guys, come with me. Good luck.
translation.de: Ihr bleibt bei ihm. Ihr kommt mit mir. Viel Glück.

translation.en: to undo it, to take it all back.
Be nice, right now, for both of us, wouldn't it?
translation.de: Sei bitte lieb, für uns beide, ok?

translation.en: Ani, I'd give anything to take it back. I'd take it all back. I'm so sorry.
translation.de: Ani, ich würde es so gerne ungeschehen machen. Verzeih mir.

translation.en: [Varrick] But guess we gotta just accept who we are now.
translation.de: Wir müssen wohl akzeptieren, wer wir jetzt sind.

translation.en: And you know, Kate, that we are…
translation.de: Du weißt ja, Kate, wir sind…

translation.en: Well, I was gonna say "indispensable parts of a system."
[Varrick] A necessary system, Kate. One that cannot accommodate dissent.
translation.de: Ein notwendiges System, Kate. Welches keinen Widerspruch duldet.

translation.en: I promise you it is not what you think it is.
translation.de: Ich verspreche dir, es ist nicht das, was du denkst.

translation.en: It turns out nothing ever was.
And I'm not looking away anymore.
translation.de: Und ich sehe nicht mehr weg.

translation.en: [in English] I see. In the 25th hour, you suddenly grew a conscience.
translation.de: Na gut. Im Angesicht des Todes hast du plötzlich ein Gewissen.

translation.en: My entire fucking life, I never loved anyone, except you.
translation.de: Ich habe mein Leben lang niemanden geliebt, nur dich.

translation.en: We both know you only love yourself.
translation.de: Du liebst doch nur dich selbst.

translation.en: It's okay. It's okay. Go on. Okay.
